sections.MISSION:
Mustang Troop, 2CR conduct a stress shoot NLT 18OCT24 IVO Range 124 IOT certify Platoon Leadership as a culminating event in PL/PSG Academy
Commander’s
sections.PURPOSE: of this operation is to certify leaders as a culminating event in PL/PSG academy.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Move under load as a buddy team
Complete all scored events as a team
Complete stress shoot at Range with no incidents
Maneuver back to SP after shoot portion
Training Objectives
Buy in before SP is 50 lunges and 50 air squats
Move 4x water cans as a team 500 meters
Sled drag 2x sleds 200m as a team
Buddy team carry for 200 meters, swap after 100m
Buy in at the range
Resourcing
OIC: 1LT Milauskas, John RSO: SSG Baskeyfield
Ammo NCO: SGT Rogers Ammo Detail: 2x PAX Lane Safety: 2x NCO’s MEV Crew: Driver + CLS
Gate Guard: 2x PAX Billeting: N/A	Chow: M / M / M
Uniform: ACH, IOTV (front and back plates), eye pro, ear pro, gloves, Camelback, 2x MRE’s
POC: 1LT Milauskas, John; john.r.milauskas.mil@army.mil
COA: 1430 08 AUG 2024
